amendment.description: Amendment reduces the amount budgeted for the general administration of Veterans Affairs by $5 million and directs it toward the Veterans Benefits Administration account in order to address backlogs in veterans claims.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that for an additional amount for Department of Veterans Affairs-Departmental Administration-General Operating Expenses, Veterans Administration, there is hereby appropriated, and the amount otherwise provided by this Act is hereby reduced by $5 million.
